header.subtext: get to know the team at JapanCanCode.com

body.title: Easy to learn programming courses taught by our leading instructors in Japan.
body.text: With the belief that our students need a strong ecosystem of support to be successful, we have also created an ecosystem for JapanCanCode Communities that include people with different expertise and backgrounds to help with our growth.
